items.title: All aboard: Amtrak's next-generation Acela makes long-awaited debut
items.description: Amtrak is finally debuting its new state-of-the-art Acela trainsets along the Northeast Corridor, a major upgrade for American train service.

items.title: United: Greenland service to resume Saturday after problems at Nuuk airport
items.description: United Airlines and other carriers had to cancel flights to and from Nuuk, Greenland, due to suspended service at the territory's main airport.
